servinfo.title: Clutch Fluid Pipe and Hose Removal and Installation

attention2.ptxt: Do not allow fluid to get on painted surface. It may cause painted surface damage.

s1.ptxt: Remove dust and dirt from each joint of hose and pipe to be disconnected and clean around reservoir cap of brake master cylinder.
Take out fluid with syringe or such.
Remove clamp (1) of clutch master cylinder (2) and disconnect fluid pipe (3).
Pull clamp (1) of fluid pipe joint (2) and disconnect fluid hose (3).

servinfosub.title: Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Clutch Fluid Pipe and Hose Inspection

servinfosub.ptxt: Reverse removal sequence noting the following points.

item.ptxt: Tighten hose bracket nut (1) to specified torque.
After installation, check clutch pedal free travel and bleed air from system.
Add fluid close to MAX level of reservoir.
